formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetTransferCapability' =-
[Synopsis] Set ISDN Transfer Capability
[Description] SetTransferCapability(transfercapability): Set the ISDN Transfer Capability of a call to a new value. Valid Transfer Capabilities are:
SPEECH : 0x00 - Speech (default, voice calls) DIGITAL : 0x08 - Unrestricted digital information (data calls) RESTRICTED_DIGITAL : 0x09 - Restricted digital information 3K1AUDIO : 0x10 - 3.1kHz Audio (fax calls) DIGITAL_W_TONES : 0x11 - Unrestricted digital information with tones/announcements VIDEO : 0x18 - Video
This application is deprecated in favor of Set(CHANNEL(transfercapability)=...)

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -13,4 +13,6 @@ RESTRICTED_DIGITAL : 0x09 - Restricted digital information 3K1AUDIO : 0x10 - 3.1kHz Audio (fax calls) DIGITAL_W_TONES : 0x11 - Unrestricted digital information with tones/announcements - VIDEO : 0x18 - Video: + VIDEO : 0x18 - Video + + This application is deprecated in favor of Set(CHANNEL(transfercapability)=...)
